test_wrangling module¶

class test_wrangling.TestAF¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the function compute_af.

Methods

test_af()

Checks whether the expected amplication factor was calculated and appended to the dataframe.
test_af()¶

Checks whether the expected amplication factor was calculated and appended to the dataframe.

class test_wrangling.TestAttenuation¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the add_attenuation and add_corr_attenuation functions.

Methods

test_add_attenuation_batch()

Checks for expected attenuation calculations applied in the batch path.

test_add_attenuation_book()

Checks for expected attenuation calculations applied in the book path.

test_add_both_att_batch()

Checks for expected attenuation and corrected attenuation calculations applied in the batch path.

test_add_both_att_book()

Checks for expected attenuation and corrected attenuation calculations applied in the book path.

test_add_corr_attenuation_batch()

Checks for expected corrected attenuation calculations applied in the batch path.

test_add_corr_attenuation_book()

Checks for expected corrected attenuation calculations applied in the book path.

test_attenuation_batch_subset1()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the sample_or_control values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_attenuation_batch_subset2()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the replicate values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_attenuation_batch_subset3()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the proton_peak_index values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_attenuation_batch_subset4()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the sat_time values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_attenuation_book_subset()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when subsets of the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_attenuation_diff_shape()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the number of true and false irradiated samples in dataframe do not match (i.e.

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the number of true and false irradiated samples in dataframe do not match (i.e.

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the replicate values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_corr_attenuation_subset2()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the sat_time values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.

test_corr_attenuation_subset3()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the concentration values in the true and false irradiated dataframes do not match.
test_add_attenuation_batch()¶

Checks for expected attenuation calculations applied in the batch path.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5.

class test_wrangling.TestCleanBatch¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating ti the function test_clean_batch_list.

Methods

test_clean_batch_list()

This function recreates the input dataframe list and checks whether the resulting cleaned dataframes match the expected results.
test_clean_batch_list()¶

This function recreates the input dataframe list and checks whether the resulting cleaned dataframes match the expected results.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5 and ignores datatype matching.

class test_wrangling.TestCurveFit¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the execute_curvefit function.

Methods

test_curvefit_batch()

Checks for whether the curvefit was executed as expected; batch path.

test_curvefit_book()

Checks for whether the curvefit was executed as expected; book path.
test_curvefit_batch()¶

Checks for whether the curvefit was executed as expected; batch path. Removes all generated plots during teardown.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-3.

test_curvefit_book()¶

Checks for whether the curvefit was executed as expected; book path. Removes all generated plots during teardown.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-3. Simply checks for filepath existence.

class test_wrangling.TestDataFrameConversion¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the dataframe conversion functions, batch_to_dataframe and book_to_dataframe.

Methods

test_batch()

Testing overall functionality.

test_book()

Testing overall functionality.

test_book_unequal()

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the number of samples and controls do not match.
test_batch()¶

Testing overall functionality. Takes in a batch Excel sheet and converts each sheet into a dataframe, returning a tuple of the form (df_name, df).

Notes

Equality checking ignores datatype matching.

test_book()¶

Testing overall functionality. Takes in a book Excel sheet and converts it into a dataframe. The created excel sheet is removed during teardown.

Notes

The equality check ignores datatype matching.

test_book_unequal()¶

Checks whether a ValueError is raised when the number of samples and controls do not match.

test_drop_peaks_book()

Checks whether the expected peaks were dropped and removes any generated files upon teardown.

test_drop_peaks_batch
test_drop_peaks_batch()¶
test_drop_peaks_book()¶

Checks whether the expected peaks were dropped and removes any generated files upon teardown.

class test_wrangling.TestPlots¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the plot generation functions.

Methods

test_concentration()

Checks for whether the expected concentration plot is generated and removes the plot upon teardown.

test_ppm()

Checks for whether the expected ppm plot is generated and removes the plot upon teardown.
test_concentration()¶

Checks for whether the expected concentration plot is generated and removes the plot upon teardown.

Notes

Simply checks for filepath existence, does not check whether the generated plot matches a baseline due to jitter.

test_ppm()¶

Checks for whether the expected ppm plot is generated and removes the plot upon teardown.

Notes

Simply checks for filepath existence, does not check whether the generated plot matches a baseline due to jitter.

class test_wrangling.TestPrep¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the prep functions.

Methods

test_prep_mean_batch()

Checks whether an Excel batch is prepped for statistical analysis on a “mean” basis.

test_prep_mean_book()

Checks whether an Excel book is prepped for statistical analysis on a “mean” basis.

test_prep_replicates_batch()

Checks whether an Excel batch is prepped for statistical analysis per replicate.

test_prep_replicates_book()

Checks whether an Excel book is prepped for statistical analysis per replicate.
test_prep_mean_batch()¶

Checks whether an Excel batch is prepped for statistical analysis on a “mean” basis.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5 and ignores datatype matching.

test_prep_mean_book()¶

Checks whether an Excel book is prepped for statistical analysis on a “mean” basis.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5 and ignores datatype matching.

test_prep_replicates_batch()¶

Checks whether an Excel batch is prepped for statistical analysis per replicate.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5.

test_prep_replicates_book()¶

Checks whether an Excel book is prepped for statistical analysis per replicate.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5.

class test_wrangling.TestT¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the t-test analysis function.

Methods

test_t()

Performa a sample t-test and checks whether the expected results were appended to the inputted dataframe.
test_t()¶

Performa a sample t-test and checks whether the expected results were appended to the inputted dataframe.

Notes

Equality checking uses a relative tolerance of 1e-5.
